resources.string: The app needs access to your location in order to suggest routes.
The app needs access to your location in order to suggest routes and/or share routes to the other users.
Failed to register user. Server is busy. Please try again later.
Failed to login user. Either the password is incorrect or the email not exist.
The email you entered already exists in the database. You can try to login again. Or, you can use another email to register a new account.
Do you want to add a marker on where you tapped?
You can tap on the map to add a marker. The app will try to connect all the markers to create a route. Or you can tap the record button to record the route as you walk along.
The app restricted the maximum distance of the route to be 5000 km. Please choose another place.
There is not enough marker to create a route. Please add up to 10 markers.
You can tap on the map to add a marker. The app will try to connect all the markers to create a route.
Do you want to remove the marker?
You can only add up to 10 markers.
Do you want to clean the previous route created, and create a new one?
The route has been successfully shared!
The app provides a place for dog owners to share dog walk routes. The user can share routes as well as getting suggestions of routes near a chosen location.
Please fill in the field you want to update and click submit button. Notice that if you are changing your password, you need to enter current password, new password and confirm password.
Password is required to change the email. We need to do re-authentication. Thanks.
There is error in the server when updating the email. Please try again later.
There is error when getting user\'s information. Please logout and login again and try.
There is error when logging in user\'s account to change the email. Please make sure the password is correct. Please enter the password again.
The email has been updated successfully. But since the email is the login key, you need to login again now. Please use the new email to login.
There is error when getting user\'s information. Please logout and login again and try.
There is error in the server when updating the password. Please try again later.
There is error when logging in user\'s account to change the password. Please make sure the current password is correct. Please enter the current password again.
The password has been updated successfully. Since you changed the password, you need to login again.
The route will be saved in the database. It will be suggested to the other users.
The reset password email has been successfully sent to your email. Please click the reset link in your email. If you can\'t find the email, please also check the spam folder.
There is error sending the reset password email. Please make sure this email is the one registered in the app.
